section.name: Analysis, filtering, combining, and segmentation of 2D images
section.text: The programs in this section are dedicated to basic 2D image processing tasks, like filtering, combining pairs of images, creating test images, and evaluating statistics.

section.name: Analysis, filtering, combining, and segmentation of 3D images
section.text: The programs in this section are dedicated to basic 3D image processing tasks, like filtering, combining pairs of images, creating test images, and evaluating statistics.

section.name: Filtering of series of 2D images in a 3D fashion (out-of-core)
section.text: The programs in this section are dedicated to processing series of 2D images in a 3D fashion out-of-core. This is intended for large images that would not fit into the main memory if processing was to be done as a true 3D images. As a result, only spacial, non-iterative filters are supported.

section.name: Image conversion
section.text: The programs in this section are used to convert bewteen the supported image file formats, to combine 2D images to a 3D representation extract 2D slices from 3D images. Note, that for the conversion between pixel formats the programs mia-2dimagefilter, and mia-3dimagefilter, in conjunction with the corresponding convert:2dimage/filter and convert:3dimage/filter have to be used.
